long.para: Each unit vector returned is the result of two calls on the &matlab; function rand, and hence randv modifies the state of the generator used by rand. To initialise the generator or control the choice of generator, use rand.

examples.precode:
>> randv(2)
ans = 2x2 pure quaternion array
>> abs(ans)
ans =
1.0000 1.0000 1.0000 1.0000
